title: @Riot I Can't Log Into My Account
body: Please respond to me Riot. I can't access the account i put countless hours and money into. For some reason it is not letting me log in with my username and password that I have had for 5 years. Please help Riot.

replies.body: Are you signed into the proper region when trying to login?  If you are still having any issues, try the steps in the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I made the account 5 years ago and I had about 10 different email addresses at the time and I can't remember/figure out which email address  I used. Please help me out man, I have no idea how my account information even got changed. I never ever ever ever would have changed my username or password. And also I have emails about my account to a certain email address but those emails stopped sometime in February for some reason. I don't know what is going on and how I lost my account but please help me out.
Did you sing into one of those "christmas rp events" that was getting spread on facebook? If you did, that website was fake and stole your account. If no, ignore this whole comment.
same its been 2 weeks for me and no help they i just lost my account that i worked hard at and put money in cant even login

hey riot, my friend cannot login, it says his account is migrating in the new client and in the old that his account is permanent banned, he hasnt played for a month and he could play fine before. denis2464@web.de is his email-address.
Help is really appreciated!
